summary: In summary, the customer service agent provided the customer with information about the activation process and billing cycle for their Contoso Wireless TV service. They also informed the customer that they could get help setting up their TV service through 24/7 customer service and an extensive library of helpful articles and videos. Finally, they explained that no additional equipment is required to set up the TV service, but they do offer a range of accessories that can be purchased through their website or at one of their retail locations.
